message: Let's settle this quickly, Bob. Take this generous offer while it still holds value.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This is a fair split.
The clock is ticking, Bob. My offer from Round 1 is off the table. This is the best you'll get.
Alice, my offer is still generous. Don't let time erode the value further.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share even more!
Alice, I'm trying to be fair, but this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
